summary: This document is an email chain from August 14, 2019, discussing a media interview with Jeffrey Epstein's former bodyguard, Igor Zinoviev. The sender forwards a link to the interview and comments on its content, describing it as absurd, unprofessional, and potentially not useful.

persons.name: Igor Zinoviev
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of a media interview about his former boss, Jeffrey Epstein. The interview is discussed in the email chain.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Subject of the interview and former employer
persons.context: Referenced as the 'old boss' of Igor Zinoviev in an interview discussed in the email chain.

connections.description: Zinoviev was Epstein's bodyguard, as indicated by the interview title 'Jeffrey Epstein's bodyguard Igor Zinoviev on His Old Boss.'

events.title: Media interview with Igor Zinoviev
events.description: An interview with Jeffrey Epstein's former bodyguard, Igor Zinoviev, is published by New York Magazine's Intelligencer, discussing his experiences with Epstein.

keyFacts: An email from August 14, 2019, references a media interview with Jeffrey Epstein's former bodyguard, Igor Zinoviev.
The interview is published on New York Magazine's Intelligencer website.
The email sender criticizes the interview as 'absurd' and 'unprofessional,' suggesting it may not contain useful information.
